channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024010423
item.description:
Report X-2024010423

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: FIBERBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED IN THE SORT AISLE ON THE BELT BY THE SORTER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED WET OUTER PACKAGING. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE PROPER PROCEDURES AND DISCOVERED A FIBERBOARD BOX CONTAINING A BATTERY THAT APPEARED TO BE LEAKING FROM THE TERMINAL CAPS. THE BATTERY WAS DISPOSED OF VIA THE FACILTY WASTE PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024010518
item.description:
Report X-2024010518

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKING BOX AT LV PICKOFF STATION REPORTED TO PSC BY PD-4. RESPONDER BROUGHT BOX BACK TO PSC. INSIDE WERE 2 BIC LIGHTERS AND AN 80% ALCOHOL BOTTLE OF PERFECT ADVANCED HAND SANITIZER (THE LEAKER) PGIII UN1170 ETHYL ALCOHOL. DUE TO NO HAZMAT WARNING STICKERS ON BOX, RESPONDERNOTIFIED SUPERVISOR AND STARTED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024010440
item.description:
Report X-2024010440

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN PACKAGE ARRIVED IT WAS SOILED DUE TO A LOOSE CAP SOILING BOX DescribePack: PACKAGE HAD A LOOSE CAP CAUSING LIQUID TO LEAK ON ONE WHOLE SIDE OF THE BOX DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED THEN PLACED INTO A HAZMAT TOTE
